website_summaries.verdict: A great all-terrain tire that is at home both on and off the road and in most weather conditions.
pros: Offers better grip than most all-terrain vehicles due to the alternating tread pattern on the surface of the tire
Tread compound is extra thick to resist punctures
Tread block arrangement reduces tire noise
cons: Creates a large amount of noise during high-speed highway travel

customer_reviews.title: ... and it made a big difference in snow and bad weather. Only put about 1000 miles on them ...
customer_reviews.text: Changed the stock tires on my 2012 FJ Cruiser to these and it made a big difference in snow and bad weather. Only put about 1000 miles on them so I dont have a long term review but I like them so far. Now it feels like a off road vehicle and drives great on the highway. Makes a little more noise on the road at high speeds. Tires are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby V

customer_reviews.title: Ride and grip great
customer_reviews.text: Had a set of the original on my 03 Discovery and a set of the G2s on my 07 GX470. Both ride amazing and the G2s grip better than the originals. Look great as well. Can't speak to tire life, but after nearly 10k on them they look like new. Tires balance out very well and highly recommend them. Most recent order was for a spare and it shipped and arrived VERY quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AgentOverland

customer_reviews.title: RAM 1500 owners will love these tires.
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered my tires on Monday...they arrived on Wednesday. Just put these on my 2011 Ram 1500 today and went for a 150 mile drive in the Tetons on a curvy mountain road. My truck handled like a champ. The traction is awesome and it rides nicely. The tread is deep on the tires so they should make 50,000 miles and the road noise is minimal at best. Highly recommend these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all i can say about these tires. These tirea r awesome. They grip great and in the rain lets just say they don't slip very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Had these tires at 5 stars because they were doing great but after having them for 8 months and barely 2000 miles on them I had one blow out when I was driving on the interstate doing 75 mph. Now the seller won't respond to anything we send them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I have over 40k miles on these now and they still look great, I am really impressed with these tires and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostrider

customer_reviews.title: On my Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: fit and finish were perfect great on snow and ice here in Michigan
customer_reviews.author: Michael Trumbull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all weather tire. Cost me about $100 to have all four mounted on my f150.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: great tread wear excellent in rain or
customer_reviews.text: Second set of these tires...great tread wear excellent in rain or snow
customer_reviews.author: DaJoey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great riding tire on the street or the trail. Very nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. This is my second set on my jeep commander. Very good traction in rain and snow. No disappointments in PA here. Got 54000 out of the 1st set. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product with crazy fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tires ordered late in the afternoon and the arrived the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping. Tires have great performance both on and off-road.
customer_reviews.author: CDBUSH

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding A/T tires
customer_reviews.text: I have the old style I'm my Jeep and put these new models on my 4Runner and they are fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Nitto Terra
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tire you can buy, if you asking about noise, no pain no gain
customer_reviews.author: Dhokhar1979

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire that provide 40
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tire that provide 40,000 miles of wear. This is my second set. Love the traction In snow and mud

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Tires For The Price. Definitely Great On Snow And Can Put Lots Of Miles.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great and fast delivery. Tires surpassed my expectations. Would recommend to everyone thinking of buying and going with factory look. Follow me on IG ebravo2 for pics of rims on truck!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique J.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance for the fraction of the price of other comparable models
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding rain and snow traction. Bought a set for my 2015 4Runner with TRD Pro Rims and they look great. Have only about 10,000miles on them but they look brand new as if I just put them on. Hoping to get alot of life out of these. For the price and performance, they are in the top tier.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pok

customer_reviews.text: nitto terra grapper g2's, all the way around.... teamed up with awd.... are a unstoppable combination. "HA...WHAT".... 24in of snow ?!

customer_reviews.text: Great Tire having to buy two more because i messed up my alignment and didnt pay attention and messed up the tread wear. but my rear tires are fantastic nice tread wear and everything. I highly Recommend
